name: Hulu Student Discount
description: Hulu streaming for $1.99/month (80% off) for college students
fullDescription: Hulu offers college students the ad-supported plan for $1.99/month (normally $9.99), a savings of 80%. Available through SheerID verification.
whatTheyOffer:
- Hulu (ad-supported) for $1.99/month
- 80% off regular price
- Full streaming library access
- Watch on multiple devices
- Available for up to 4 years
howToGetIt:
1. Visit hulu.com/student
2. Verify enrollment through SheerID
3. Must be enrolled at US Title IV college
4. New and returning subscribers eligible
5. Re-verify student status annually
keywords: Hulu, student discount, streaming, TV shows, movies, college, university
